charges.charge_description: Commit Violations of distribution in excess of fifty (50) grams of crack cocaine, a schedule II controlled substance, in violation of 21 USC 841(b)(1)A; and possession of a firearm during the commission of a drug trafficking crime in violation of 18 USC 924(C)(1)(A)

Commit Violations of distribution in excess of fifty (50) grams of crack cocaine, a schedule II controlled substance, in violation of 21 USC 841(b)(1)A; and possession of a firearm during the commission of a drug trafficking crime in violation of 18 USC 924(C)(1)(A)
